definition: to prefer/to be partial to sth/preference
to lean/to slant/oblique/prejudiced/to deviate from average/to stray from the intended line/stubbornly/contrary to expectations
good/well/proper/good to/easy to/very/so/(suffix indicating completion or readiness)/(of two people) close/on intimate terms/(after a personal pronoun) hello
to be fond of/to have a tendency to/to be prone to

sentences.english: It also stores the preferred language for this user.
sentences.chinese: 另外它也存儲該用戶所偏好的語言。

sentences.english: Therefore, individual-preference curves should be substituted for statistical probabilities in decision trees.
sentences.chinese: 因此，在決策樹中個人的偏好曲線應當取代統計機率。

sentences.english: In particular, terminology and style are subjective and are mostly deter mined by the client reviewer's preferences.
sentences.chinese: 尤其是術語和風格，大多由客戶審校員的偏好來決定。

sentences.english: The relationships among the needs and preferences were examined through canonical variate analysis.
sentences.chinese: 需求和偏好之間的關係由規範變量分析來檢測。

sentences.english: To add even more variety, each person has different learning styles and preferences.
sentences.chinese: 學習的方法和偏好也是因人而異。

sentences.english: Adrian:Check anyway. I prefer charter flights to commercial ones.
sentences.chinese: 好好查查吧，比起商務艙，我還是偏好包租的座位。

sentences.english: Therarity bias is also sometimes called a" nonconformist bias".
sentences.chinese: 罕見稀有偏好有時也被稱爲“非從衆偏好”。

sentences.english: Therarity bias is also sometimes called a" nonconformist bias".
sentences.chinese: 罕見稀有偏好有時也被稱爲“非從衆偏好”。

sentences.english: The fuzzy multiple attribute decision-making (MADM) problem with fuzzy preference information is investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究了具有模糊偏好信息的模糊多屬性決策問題。

sentences.english: That appetite has remained following the GFC.
sentences.chinese: 這種偏好一直持續到全球金融危機。

sentences.english: And the type of proof that the rabbinate prefers is peculiarly unsuited to Jewish life in the United States.
sentences.chinese: 而他們偏好的身份證明，是美籍猶太人非常不適應的。

sentences.english: Similarly, brown-eyed men showed no preference for either blue-eyed or brown-eyed female models.
sentences.chinese: 同樣，棕眼男性對藍眼或棕眼女模特也無偏好。

sentences.english: The preference for thinner partners goes both ways, of course.
sentences.chinese: 當然，選擇較瘦的伴侶的偏好是雙向的。

sentences.english: ly records our preferences and learns to work with us.
sentences.chinese: ly可以記錄我們的偏好，然後學會跟我們合作。

sentences.english: Zhu Ziqing used analogy much more, but preferred the use of female images.
sentences.chinese: 朱自清用喻較多，而且偏好對女性意象的使用。

definition: to like/fond of/to prefer/to love/one's tastes/preference
to incline to/to prefer/to be prone to
partial towards sth/to prefer/to incline/erroneous tendencies (Leftist or Revisionist deviation)
to stress in a prejudiced way/to emphasize sth unduly
